title: 如何看待百度考虑从nasdaq退市？
contents:
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-baidu-delisting-excusive/exclusive-baidu-considers-leaving-the-nasdaq-to-boost-its-valuation-sources-idUSKBN22X1HA

阿里巴巴已经香港上市，百度退了以后，大型中概只剩下京东和拼多多了，看来脱钩是在“有序”进行中。


再联系今天白宫的一篇文章 United States Strategic Approach to The People’s Republic of China。 美正式承认几十年的中国“接触”政策失败
https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/U.S.-Strategic-Approach-to-The-Peoples-Republic-of-China-Report-5.20.20.pdf
